overview: This is the Hot Cops Series Volume 2. Visit the Rockies with the perfectly muscled and athletic men of Centaur. Watch them play hard on the slopes and with each other...Witness the mountain patrol as they deliver their own unforgetable brand of "community service". A vintage Daniels production sure to make you melt!
tagline: Visit the Rockies with the perfectly muscled and athletic men of Centaur.
title: Mountain Patrol
